firstInteraction: ^We've started seeing improvements, but depowering the Orbserver may be the correct solution. The previous adjustments have changed it.
^It's become friendly to the Atlas units we’ve been feeding it, and listening to their beeps and boops.
^We should adjust its memory processing in the fourth terminal to 20%, all of that being virus.
^This should make it turn down its ability to communicate and stick with long term plans.
^If that fails to make it manageable for our purposes.. I think we may have to shut it down completely.
